description: This file is a complete HTML web page for a database viewer interface, containing markup, styling, and embedded JavaScript for frontend interactions, including dynamic loading and display of database, table, and data information.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, resets current selections.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the table list for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads and displays tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data from a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders the table data into an HTML table structure.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual table cell content, handling objects, long strings, and nulls.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for objects or long strings.
